title: Region Slice
description: A slice of an implicit region relative to an ellipsoid. Defines the subsection of the region that the implicit volume actually occupies.

minHeight.description: The start of the slice along the region's height.

maxHeight.description: The end of the slice along the region's height.

minAngle.description: The start of the slice along the angles of the reference ellipsoid, in radians. The first element corresponds to the azimuthal angle (a.k.a longitude) and must be in the range [-pi, pi]. The second element corresponds to the polar angle (a.k.a. latitude) and must be in the range [-pi/2, pi/2].

maxAngle.description: The end of the slice along the angles of the reference ellipsoid, in radians. The first element corresponds to the azimuthal angle (a.k.a longitude) and must be in the range [-pi, pi]. The second element corresponds to the polar angle (a.k.a. latitude) and must be in the range [-pi/2, pi/2].
